TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Kakawit, title = Kakawit, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kakawit} }

S.FORM: Takaray a sowal O kakawit hananay i, o mamangay a kawkaw, o kamit hananay ko roma a pangangan, o sapipanay a po'ot, itini i sawalian a niyaro' o minik hananay ko kamit. ona kakawit hananay a sowal i, ira ho ko roma a imi nona tilid, o sapikawit to kakawiten a dafong.

Takaray a sowal O kakawit hananay i, o mamangay a kawkaw, o kamit hananay ko roma a pangangan, o sapipanay a po'ot, itini i sawalian a niyaro' o minik hananay ko kamit. ona kakawit hananay a sowal i, ira ho ko roma a imi nona tilid, o sapikawit to kakawiten a dafong.
